statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , AA.Description
, BB.ChannelName , CC.BrandName
FROM dbo.TChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.* , BB.ChannelName , CC.BrandName
FROM dbo.TChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TChannelBrand ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ChannelID, BrandID, StartDate, EndDate, ChannelMargin, BrandMargin, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ChannelID#, #BrandID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #ChannelMargin#, #BrandMargin#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TChannelBrand SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ChannelID = #ChannelID# , BrandID = #BrandID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , ChannelMargin = #ChannelMargin# , BrandMargin = #BrandMargin# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select:
SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate = #StartDate#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MAX(StartDate) FROM dbo.TChannelBrand WHERE ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND BrandID = #BrandID# AND StartDate < #StartDate# )

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MIN(StartDate) FROM dbo.TChannelBrand WHERE ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND BrandID = #BrandID# AND StartDate > #StartDate# )
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TChannelBrand SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#
